markdownRemark.html:
Very refreshing episode. At first, I thought the other animation studio did the drawing. I couldn‚Äôt confirm on Reddit but after the first scene, it looked spot on.

I thought they would‚Äôve shown us how Kenma got his blond hair. I like how they bond and become true teammates. Even using his pseudonym ‚ÄúTora‚Äù during the game. Youth, what a wonderful thing üòÅ
